item.title: NullCon 2017: Programing1 [200]
item.description: Challenge: “We unearthed this text file from one of the older servers and want to know what this is all about. Could you please analyse this and let us know your finding?” and there is a text file attached I have a quick look at the file and I have a quick guess that its an RGB array because the 3 elemnts tuples are bounded by 255 –> FF. I need now to guess the width and the heigth of the image because the values are stuffed in an one dimentional list.
